dt_allocation_hint Struct Reference
[dt]

This is a general purpose dt allocation hint. More...

#include <dt_object.h>

Data Fields

struct dt_object * dah_parent
const void * dah_eadata
int dah_eadata_len
__u32 dah_mode

Detailed Description

This is a general purpose dt allocation hint.

It now contains the parent object. It can contain any allocation hint in the future.
